Key Match Events: Sri Lanka needed another 3 off 4 balls.
Dasun Shanaka plays it across covers and fetches a boundary for it.
Kusal Mendis is the new batter in.
Pre-Game Insights: Shakib Al Hasan said, 'We wanted to field first, but that's not in our control. We didn't bat well against Afghanistan, but today is a different day. We have three changes in our team, we have made quite a few changes. Hopefully that will work for us today. We want to play some good cricket today, we are not concerned about what is being talked in the media.'
Dasun Shanaka said, 'We are going to bowl first. It's a used wicket, so chasing will be important. We had a good preparation coming into this game. We are concentrate on our batting.'
Post-Match Reflections: VICTORY! #SriLanka grab the win and drag themselves into the Super 4! The highest chase in #AsiaCup history!
Miscellaneous Highlights: Sri Lanka won the match by 2 wickets to qualify for the Super 4 stage.
